Class PortRenderContext

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Context information passed to port renderers.

TRANSFORM-BASED RENDERING:

Scale is always 1.0 - create visuals at logical size. The MatrixTransform on MainCanvas handles zoom. This enables O(1) zoom. 

public class PortRenderContext

Index of this port among its siblings.

public required int Index { get; init; }

Property Value

int

InverseScale

Inverse scale for constant-size elements (1/ViewportZoom). Apply as ScaleTransform to elements that should stay same screen size.

public double InverseScale { get; }

double

IsOutput

Whether this is an output port (true) or input port (false).

public required bool IsOutput { get; init; }

Scale

Logical scale for visual sizing. Always 1.0 in transform-based rendering.
